payload.content: Structured knowledge enables entirely new kinds of applications.

name: Structured knowledge enables entirely new kinds of applications.
content: Structured knowledge enables entirely new kinds of applications.

payload.content: Current skill implementations often capture only one aspect of a topic, typically as a single file with one capability.

name: Current skill implementations often capture only one aspect of a topic, typicall
content: Current skill implementations often capture only one aspect of a topic, typically as a single file with one capability.

payload.content: Real depth in applications requires more than simple, single-file skill implementations.

name: Real depth in applications requires more than simple, single-file skill implemen
content: Real depth in applications requires more than simple, single-file skill implementations.

payload.content: A skill graph is a network of skill files connected with wikilinks, where each file represents a small, composable piece of knowledge (a complete thought, technique, or skill).

name: A skill graph is a network of skill files connected with wikilinks, where each f
content: A skill graph is a network of skill files connected with wikilinks, where each file represents a small, composable piece of knowledge (a complete thought, technique, or skill).

payload.content: In a skill graph, every node (skill file) should have a YAML description that an agent can scan without reading the entire file.

name: In a skill graph, every node (skill file) should have a YAML description that an
content: In a skill graph, every node (skill file) should have a YAML description that an agent can scan without reading the entire file.

payload.content: Wikilinks within a skill graph should be woven into prose to carry meaning, allowing an agent to follow relevant paths and skip irrelevant content.

name: Wikilinks within a skill graph should be woven into prose to carry meaning, allo
content: Wikilinks within a skill graph should be woven into prose to carry meaning, allowing an agent to follow relevant paths and skip irrelevant content.

payload.content: Skill graphs utilize a progressive disclosure pattern for information access: index → descriptions → links → sections → full content, enabling most decisions before reading a full file.

name: Skill graphs utilize a progressive disclosure pattern for information access: in
content: Skill graphs utilize a progressive disclosure pattern for information access: index → descriptions → links → sections → full content, enabling most decisions before reading a full file.

payload.content: Use wikilinks that read as prose in sentences to convey meaning beyond mere references.

name: Use wikilinks that read as prose in sentences to convey meaning beyond mere refe
content: Use wikilinks that read as prose in sentences to convey meaning beyond mere references.

payload.content: Include YAML frontmatter with descriptions in skill files so agents can scan them without reading the full content.

name: Include YAML frontmatter with descriptions in skill files so agents can scan the
content: Include YAML frontmatter with descriptions in skill files so agents can scan them without reading the full content.

payload.content: Maps of Content (MOCs) are used to organize clusters of related skills into navigable sub-topics within a skill graph.

name: Maps of Content (MOCs) are used to organize clusters of related skills into navi
content: Maps of Content (MOCs) are used to organize clusters of related skills into navigable sub-topics within a skill graph.

payload.content: Arscontexta is a skill graph (or knowledge base) comprising approximately 250 connected markdown files designed to teach an agent how to build skill graphs.

name: Arscontexta is a skill graph (or knowledge base) comprising approximately 250 co
content: Arscontexta is a skill graph (or knowledge base) comprising approximately 250 connected markdown files designed to teach an agent how to build skill graphs.

payload.content: Complex domains like cognitive science, zettelkasten, graph theory, and agent architecture require interconnected research claims (skills) in a graph structure, where each piece is composable and traversable, rather than a single skill file.

name: Complex domains like cognitive science, zettelkasten, graph theory, and agent ar
content: Complex domains like cognitive science, zettelkasten, graph theory, and agent architecture require interconnected research claims (skills) in a graph structure, where each piece is composable and traversable, rather than a single skill file.

payload.content: To build a skill graph easily, install the Arscontexta Claude code plugin, select a research preset, point it at a topic, and then fill the generated markdown folder structure using /learn and /reduce commands.

name: To build a skill graph easily, install the Arscontexta Claude code plugin, selec
content: To build a skill graph easily, install the Arscontexta Claude code plugin, select a research preset, point it at a topic, and then fill the generated markdown folder structure using /learn and /reduce commands.

payload.content: A skill graph does not need to reside in a specific folder; its key component is an index file that informs the agent about existing content and how to traverse it.

name: A skill graph does not need to reside in a specific folder; its key component is
content: A skill graph does not need to reside in a specific folder; its key component is an index file that informs the agent about existing content and how to traverse it.

payload.content: The index file for a skill graph functions as an entry point that directs the agent's attention, allowing it to understand the landscape and follow relevant links for the current conversation.

name: The index file for a skill graph functions as an entry point that directs the ag
content: The index file for a skill graph functions as an entry point that directs the agent's attention, allowing it to understand the landscape and follow relevant links for the current conversation.

payload.content: Each linked file within a skill graph represents a standalone methodological claim or skill.

name: Each linked file within a skill graph represents a standalone methodological cla
content: Each linked file within a skill graph represents a standalone methodological claim or skill.

payload.content: Wikilinks embedded within the prose of skill graph nodes should explicitly indicate to the agent when and why to follow them.

name: Wikilinks embedded within the prose of skill graph nodes should explicitly indic
content: Wikilinks embedded within the prose of skill graph nodes should explicitly indicate to the agent when and why to follow them.

payload.content: Maps of Content (MOCs) are used to organize sub-topics as a skill graph grows larger.

name: Maps of Content (MOCs) are used to organize sub-topics as a skill graph grows la
content: Maps of Content (MOCs) are used to organize sub-topics as a skill graph grows larger.
